about_the_game:
Enjoy all the advantages of WoT Premium Account for 30 days and get a handful of consumables on top!

WoT Premium Account has a lot of benefits that make the game even more enjoyable:

  • Bonuses: Premium Account provides a +50% bonus to Combat Experience, Crew Experience and credits earned in battle.
  • Applicable modifier to XP: Apply an additional x3 multiplier to experience earned in your latest victorious Random Battle 5 times a day.
  • Reserve Stock: Receive an extra bonus of up to 750,000 credits within 7 days. Also, a 10% bonus to credits earned goes into a special vault.
  • Premium missions: Owners of WoT Premium Account will have the opportunity to fulfill a chain of three simple daily missions.
  • Platoon bonus: In a Platoon, WoT Premium Account holders receive a 15% credit bonus. Also, fellow Platoon members who are not holders receive a 10% bonus.
  • One more slot for excluded maps.

Also in the package:

  • x10 Large Repair Kit
  • x10 Large First Aid Kit
  • x10 Automatic Fire Extinguisher

DLC can be added to your World of Tanks account only once.
You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

name: World of Tanks — Premium Month Pack

subs.option_text: World of Tanks - Premium Month Pack - $18.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy World of Tanks — Premium Month Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 4550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Desktop)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space

short_description: Enjoy all the advantages of WoT Premium Account for 30 days and get a handful of consumables on top!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Czech*, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
